title: Worm
description:
A pink or brown worm. Most platforms have more realistic designs, though Google and Samsung feature cartoony worms who are smiling sweetly.

Can be used to talk about worms or disease spread by worms. Can also be used to refer to a deceitful person. May be used to in reference to the dance move 'the worm.'
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the worm emoji is a delightful, segmented creature with a gentle, curious expression, appearing to wriggle with a smooth, organic curve. Its design features Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded forms, giving it a friendly and approachable look. This emoji, rendered with a cheerful green hue and subtle highlights on Apple devices, can represent nature, perseverance, or even a playful, slightly mischievous sentiment.
